Row.Text: British Unique Gold Building. +9 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Adjacency for Quarters and Wonders. Ageless.

British Unique Production Building. +9 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. +1 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production Adjacency for Resources and Wonders. +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Adjacency for Navigable Rivers. Ageless.
British Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Manufactory and Royal Exchange in the same District. +2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science for every connected Settlement.
+2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science for every connected Settlement.
+4[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. Receive a second Naval Unit each time you train a Naval Unit (But not Purchase). Ageless. Must be placed on land adjacent to Coast.
Receive a second Naval Unit each time you train a Naval Unit.[N]Must be placed on land adjacent to Coast.
You asked me once if I remembered Battersea. And now I do.
